scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,admin -c green,yellow,cyan "npm run start:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.build:admin: npm --prefix admin ci && npm --prefix admin run build
scripts.build: concurrently -n frontend,admin -c yellow,cyan "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:admin"
